mapper.insert: insert into user_face_info (userId, groupId, faceId, `name`, age, email, gender, phoneNumber, createTime, updateTime, Fpath, faceFeature) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{facefeature,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update user_face_info set groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, faceId = #{faceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, phoneNumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Fpath = #{fpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, faceFeature = #{facefeature,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select userId, groupId, faceId, `name`, age, email, gender, phoneNumber, createTime, updateTime, Fpath, faceFeature from user_face_info where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
